user.description: Select a location to get the closest measuring station.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: The World Air Quality Index YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description:
Configuring World Air Quality Index using YAML is being removed but there was an authentication error importing your YAML configuration.

Correct the YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the World Air Quality Index YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The WAQI YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring World Air Quality Index using YAML is being removed but there was an connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Ensure connection to WAQI works and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the World Air Quality Index YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_already_con.title: The WAQI YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_already_con.description:
Configuring World Air Quality Index using YAML is being removed but the measuring station was already imported when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Ensure the imported configuration is correct and remove the World Air Quality Index YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
